Detailed Description

Power descriptor.

Mandatory for each node.

Definition at line 134 of file appFramework.h.

Field Documentation

uint8_t PowerDescriptor_t::currentPowerMode

Specifies the current sleep/power-saving mode of the node.
0000 - Receiver synchronized with the 'receiver on when idle' subfield of the node descriptor.
0001 - Receiver comes on periodically as defined by the node power descriptor.
0010 - Receiver comes on when stimulated, e.g. by a user pressing a button.
0011-1111 - Reserved.

Definition at line 141 of file appFramework.h.

uint8_t PowerDescriptor_t::availablePowerSources

Specifies the power sources available on this node.
0 - Constant (mains) power
1 - Rechargeable battery
2 - Disposable battery
3 - Reserved.

Definition at line 147 of file appFramework.h.

uint8_t PowerDescriptor_t::currentPowerSource

Specifies the power source being currently used by the node.
0 - Constant (mains) power
1 - Rechargeable battery
2 - Disposable battery
3 - Reserved.

Definition at line 153 of file appFramework.h.

uint8_t PowerDescriptor_t::currentPowerSourceLevel

Specifies the level of charge of the power source.
0000 - Critical
0100 - 33%
1000 - 66%
1100 - 100%
All other values - Reserved.

Definition at line 160 of file appFramework.h.
